thread.section_title: The Tech Authority Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Tech Authority | www.thetechauthority.com
thread.title: William Pulsipher Jr.
thread.title_full: The Tech Authority reviewed by William Pulsipher Jr.

author: William Pulsipher Jr.
title: William Pulsipher Jr.
text: I have used Cotecq Technical Services for several yeas and I am always very pleased with the service I receive. Today Dinesh Kumar was exceptional in his knowledge and professional approach solving computing problems. It was clear that he is very experienced and has exactly the right attitude to provide the services customers require with sometimes very frustrating situations. His calm and direct approx was reassuring as h completed his work. He should be commended for his work as hew represents the type of technician that Coteq routinely provides to help thier customers.
